contact.title: Let's Talk!
contact.description: If you have any questions, collaboration proposals, or just want to chat, feel free to contact me through any of these channels.

home.introduction:
hello! I'm Tony, although my pseudonym is -- txnio --, right now I'm building things for the web,

for now studying different technologies to be able to express art in browser windows.

I like cinema, photography and hypnagogic music.

projectDescriptions.txniOS Old: Interactive simulation of Mac OS 7 with functional windows and classic system aesthetics.
projectDescriptions.Cubes: An interactive visual experience with 3D cubes using Three.js and React Three Fiber.
projectDescriptions.Minder: An application to upload images, comments and projects using Firebase, React, TypeScript, Next.js and Google authentication.
projectDescriptions.Second Portfolio: A portfolio inspired by the work of Yihui Hu, with a sticker-type design.
projectDescriptions.3D Crystal Effect: A 3D crystal visual effect implemented with JavaScript.
projectDescriptions.Infinite Particles: An infinite particle animation created with JavaScript.
projectDescriptions.Floating Images: A minimal gallery with mouse interaction for floating images.
projectDescriptions.Pixel Transition: A simple pixel transition for the menu bar.
projectDescriptions.Gradient Generator: A gradient generator implemented in JavaScript.
